name: Red Pepper Powder
properties: Can be mixed into soups or smoothies
benefits: Red pepper powder activates brown adipose tissue (BAT) which increases metabolism and calorie burning. Half a teaspoon daily provides thermogenic effects similar to eating a whole jalapeño pepper. The capsaicin stimulates fat oxidation and energy expenditure.

quotes: Alternately, for BAT activation, you can add one raw jalapeño pepper or ½ teaspoon of red pepper powder (or, presumably, crushed red pepper flakes) into your daily diet.
